title: Is a BHMS degree a postgraduate one? Can my child take the GPSC & the UPSC exam after completing a BHMS? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Homoeopathic Medicine and Surgery Degrees
Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: BHMS is not a post graduate degree. After BHMS graduation one can pursue MD(HOMEO). GPSC and UPSC exam can be taken after BHMS because their eligibility criteria is graduation.
